cards.name: Batman
cards.bio: The Dark Knight himself, using his combat skills and gadgets to protect Gotham.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Batman in a dark and brooding pose, with the city of Gotham in the background, art style of The Dark Knight Rises

cards.name: Catwoman
cards.bio: Selina Kyle, a skilled thief with a taste for high-stakes burglary.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Catwoman with her iconic whip and goggles, art style of The Dark Knight Rises

cards.name: John Blake
cards.bio: A determined young police officer, inspired by Batman's legacy.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: John Blake holding a badge, with a look of determination, art style of The Dark Knight Rises

cards.name: Commissioner Gordon
cards.bio: The resilient police commissioner of Gotham, ally to Batman.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Commissioner Gordon with his signature coat and glasses, art style of The Dark Knight Rises

cards.name: Alfred Pennyworth
cards.bio: Bruce Wayne's loyal butler and confidant, always there to offer sage advice.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Alfred Pennyworth with a wise and caring expression, art style of The Dark Knight Rises

cards.name: Lucius Fox
cards.bio: The ingenious mind behind Wayne Enterprises' R&D, supplying Batman with tech.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Lucius Fox in a lab with high-tech gadgets, art style of The Dark Knight Rises

cards.name: Miranda Tate
cards.bio: A philanthropist and member of Wayne Enterprises' executive board with a secret.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Miranda Tate with an enigmatic smile, art style of The Dark Knight Rises

cards.name: Deputy Commissioner Foley
cards.bio: A high-ranking officer in the Gotham City Police Department, with ambitions.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Deputy Commissioner Foley in uniform, looking ambitious, art style of The Dark Knight Rises

cards.name: Scarecrow
cards.bio: Dr. Jonathan Crane, a former psychiatrist turned fear-inducing villain.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Scarecrow with his frightening mask, art style of The Dark Knight Rises

cards.name: Bane's Mercenary
cards.bio: One of Bane's loyal followers, trained and ready for combat.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: A menacing mercenary in combat gear, art style of The Dark Knight Rises

cards.name: Bane
cards.bio: The main antagonist, a formidable foe with a plan to destroy Gotham.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Bane standing powerfully, with his iconic mask, art style of The Dark Knight Rises
